Subject: Leaving

Content-Length: 631

From: wilddance_mare@...

Quickstrike:




Quickstrike grinned at the sight of Blackarachnia. He approached her, 
covered in Rowdy Wolf's pelts that he ripped up to his stature so he 
wouldn't have to work his core temperature so hard. 

"Miss me?" He took one more step up closer. "Sugar bot, there's 
something ah gotta do. Ah'm gonna go out back t' that base an' kill 
that bot who damaged me. He did somethin' t' me an' it ain't fixin' 
right. Ah know we's supposed t' be partners an' all---could be just 
me, but anyways ah'm gonna go alone. Ah'll be back. Ah promise. Ah 
got someone t' help me. So, don't worry too much." He nodded for an 
approval.
